entry.value: from sklearn.tree import DecisionTreeClassifier%%00010%%00010# Identify class labels%%00010labels = input_table['Cluster Membership']%%00010%%00010# Designate features to learn from%%00010features = input_table.iloc[:,0:10]%%00010%%00010# Create a classifier%%00010output_model = DecisionTreeClassifier()%%00010%%00010# Fit the model using the features and labels%%00010output_model.fit(features, labels)%%00010%%00010
